directions: Mix tomato and clam juice cocktail, ketchup, lemon juice, cilantro, cucumber, shrimp, imitation crabmeat, and green bell pepper in a 2-quart container. Chill 8 hours or overnight and serve in bowls topped with diced avocado and tomato.
ingredients: 1 (64 ounce) bottle tomato and clam juice cocktail
title: Mexican-Inspired Seafood Gazpacho
